verses.verse: בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year הָעֲשִׂירִ֔ית <S%H6224><s%> In the tenth בָּעֲשִׂרִ֕י <S%H6224><s%> in the tenth בִּשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> set פָּנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> against Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְהִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> against וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> against him and against all Egypt כֻּלָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <S%H559><s%> and say כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> I am against פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> Behold I [am] against thee Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הַתַּנִּים֙ <S%H8577><s%> dragon הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the great הָרֹבֵ֖ץ <S%H7257><s%> that lieth בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst יְאֹרָ֑יו <S%H2975><s%> of his rivers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> which hath said לִ֥י יְאֹרִ֖י <S%H2975><s%> My river וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> myself עֲשִׂיתִֽנִי׃ <S%H6213><s%> [is] mine own and I have made

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> But I will put [חַחִיִּים כ] (חַחִים֙ <S%H2397><s%> bracelet ק) בִּלְחָיֶ֔יךָ <S%H3895><s%> in thy jaws וְהִדְבַּקְתִּ֥י <S%H1692><s%> to stick דְגַת־ <S%H1710><s%> and I will cause the fish יְאֹרֶ֖יךָ <S%H2975><s%> of thy rivers בְּקַשְׂקְשֹׂתֶ֑יךָ <S%H7193><s%> unto thy scales וְהַעֲלִיתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5927><s%> and I will bring thee up מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <S%H2975><s%> of thy rivers וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all דְּגַ֣ת <S%H1710><s%> and all the fish יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <S%H2975><s%> of thy rivers בְּקַשְׂקְשֹׂתֶ֖יךָ <S%H7193><s%> unto thy scales תִּדְבָּֽק׃ <S%H1692><s%> shall stick

וּנְטַשְׁתִּ֣יךָ <S%H5203><s%> And I will leave הַמִּדְבָּ֗רָה <S%H4057><s%> thee [thrown] into the wilderness אוֹתְךָ֙ <S%H853><s%> וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all דְּגַ֣ת <S%H1710><s%> thee and all the fish יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <S%H2975><s%> of thy rivers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> upon the open הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> fields תִּפּ֔וֹל <S%H5307><s%> thou shalt fall לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵאָסֵ֖ף <S%H622><s%> thou shalt not be brought together וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or תִקָּבֵ֑ץ <S%H6908><s%> nor gathered לְחַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> to the beasts הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the field וּלְע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and to the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <S%H5414><s%> I have given לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> thee for meat

וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> shall know כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> And all the inhabitants מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD יַ֧עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because הֱיוֹתָ֛ם <S%H1961><s%> have been מִשְׁעֶ֥נֶת <S%H4938><s%> because they have been a staff קָנֶ֖ה <S%H7070><s%> of reed לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

בְּתָפְשָׂ֨ם <S%H8610><s%> When they took hold בְּךָ֤ [בַכַּפְךָ כ] (בַכַּף֙ <S%H3709><s%> branch ק) תֵּר֔וֹץ <S%H7533><s%> thou didst break וּבָקַעְתָּ֥ <S%H1234><s%> and rend לָהֶ֖ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כָּתֵ֑ף <S%H3802><s%> all their shoulder וּבְהִֽשָּׁעֲנָ֤ם <S%H8172><s%> and when they leaned עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> on תִּשָּׁבֵ֔ר <S%H7665><s%> upon thee thou brakest וְהַעֲמַדְתָּ֥ <S%H5976><s%> to be at a stand לָהֶ֖ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מָתְנָֽיִם׃ <S%H4975><s%> and madest all their loins ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֛י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> Behold I will bring עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> upon חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> upon thee and cut off מִמֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and beast

וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will become אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> And the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לִשְׁמָמָ֣ה <S%H8077><s%> shall be desolate וְחָרְבָּ֔ה <S%H2723><s%> and waste וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD יַ֧עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> because he hath said יְאֹ֥ר <S%H2975><s%> The river לִ֖י וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <S%H6213><s%> [is] mine and I have made

לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> I am against וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against יְאֹרֶ֑יךָ <S%H2975><s%> Behold therefore I [am] against thee and against thy rivers וְנָתַתִּ֞י <S%H5414><s%> and I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְחָרְבוֹת֙ <S%H2723><s%> waste חֹ֣רֶב <S%H2721><s%> utterly שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> [and] desolate מִמִּגְדֹּ֥ל <S%H4024><s%> from the tower סְוֵנֵ֖ה <S%H5482><s%> of Syene וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and even גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> even unto the border כּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H3568><s%> of Ethiopia

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will not תַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> shall pass through בָּהּ֙ רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> No foot אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man וְרֶ֥גֶל <S%H7272><s%> it nor foot בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> of beast לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not תַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> shall pass through בָּ֑הּ וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and it תֵשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> it neither shall it be inhabited אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶרֶץ֩ <S%H776><s%> the land מִצְרַ֨יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt שְׁמָמָ֜ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate בְּת֣וֹךְ ׀ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst אֲרָצ֣וֹת <S%H776><s%> of the countries נְשַׁמּ֗וֹת <S%H8074><s%> [that are] desolate וְעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5892><s%> and her cities בְּת֨וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among עָרִ֤ים <S%H5892><s%> the cities מָֽחֳרָבוֹת֙ <S%H2717><s%> [that are] laid waste תִּֽהְיֶ֣יןָ <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> shall be desolate אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַהֲפִצֹתִ֤י <S%H6327><s%> and I will scatter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations וְֽזֵרִיתִ֖ים <S%H2219><s%> and will disperse בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> them through the countries פ

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Yet thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD מִקֵּ֞ץ <S%H7093><s%> At the end אַרְבָּעִ֤ים <S%H705><s%> of forty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years אֲקַבֵּ֣ץ <S%H6908><s%> will I gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> from the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they נָפֹ֥צוּ <S%H6327><s%> whither they were scattered שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וְשַׁבְתִּי֙ <S%H7725><s%> And I will bring again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> the captivity מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֤י <S%H7725><s%> and will cause them to return אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [into] the land פַּתְר֔וֹס <S%H6624><s%> of Pathros עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land מְכֽוּרָתָ֑ם <S%H4351><s%> of their habitation וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there מַמְלָכָ֥ה <S%H4467><s%> kingdom שְׁפָלָֽה׃ <S%H8217><s%> and they shall be there a base

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמַּמְלָכוֹת֙ <S%H4467><s%> of the kingdoms תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁפָלָ֔ה <S%H8217><s%> It shall be the basest וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will never תִתְנַשֵּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> neither shall it exalt ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> itself any more above the nations וְהִ֨מְעַטְתִּ֔ים <S%H4591><s%> for I will diminish לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> they will not רְד֥וֹת <S%H7287><s%> them that they shall no more rule בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> over the nations

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will never יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become עוֹד֩ <S%H5750><s%> again לְבֵ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְמִבְטָח֙ <S%H4009><s%> And it shall be no more the confidence מַזְכִּ֣יר <S%H2142><s%> to remembrance עָוֹ֔ן <S%H5771><s%> [their] iniquity בִּפְנוֹתָ֖ם <S%H6437><s%> when they shall look אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> after וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> them but they shall know כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth וָשֶׁ֙בַע֙ <S%H7651><s%> And it came to pass in the seven שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year בָּֽרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> in the first בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> [month] in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying
